original_title: Here's to the Heroes - A Night with the Ten Tenors
overview: Take Australia's vocal superstars The Ten Tenors, add a 90 piece orchestra, a percussion section and some of the world's leading musicians. Apply all of this to the compositional work of film score icon John Barry and his celebrated lyricist partner Don Black. You have ‘A Night With The Ten Tenors ‘Here’s To The Heroes.’  Recorded live in the European city of Hamburg this concert event offers a unique reworking of some James Bond tunes and renditions of Queen.
title: Here's to the Heroes - A Night with the Ten Tenors
